    getSurveyId()

    JJ There are 2 ways to get SurveyId from PageBase. If you use SurveyId property if survey is not set it redirects to No access form However the tree control and Menu system in header user control request SurveyId and at that point it is valid to have no SurveyId set.If some other form requests surveyid it is through the SurveyId property a redirection can Occur

    Declaration
    public int getSurveyId()
    Returns
    Type Description
    System.Int32
